text: [Music]
happy Christmas foodtubers dollar here
welcome into my lovely Christmas kitchen
I'm in my Christmas jumper I've got my
Christmas decorations up and now it's
time to make a delicious Christmas
inspired recipe I'm gonna make a very
tasty little Christmas potato salad with
apples walnuts celery it's kind of like
it might take on a Waldorf salad very
easy to make and it starts off with
roasting my potatoes when you are
chopping up your potatoes you want them
to be kind of in nice bite-sized chunks
so that when they roast off you get this
wonderful kind of crunchy outside now
you can have your potato salad if you
like just with boiled potatoes but I
love the extra texture you get when you
roast them and add them to your potato
salad once you have all your potatoes
chopped up just like this
tumble them on to a roasting tin all I'm
gonna use to roast these off is a little
bit of olive oil and some sea salt and
black pepper this is looking really good
now these get roasted off in an oven at
about 200 degrees Celsius you want to
switch them so they get nice and
completely coated
all the way over they're gonna cook down
for about 45 minutes and you know
they're cooked because you have a lovely
crispy outside and a nice tender middle
so I have ones that have cooked off but
I'm gonna get these into the oven if I
can get past all the Christmas
decorations and these ones have come out
of the oven they're nice and cool now
and you can see I've got wonderful
crispy crunchy potatoes and this is
where the magic of this potato salad
comes into play so set them aside now we
need to talk about the dressing which
forms the basis of this great potato
salad if you get this right you are on
to an absolute winner so it starts off
with 4 tablespoons of mayonnaise so take
that out good generous dollop of
mayonnaise in here it'll really form the
basis of a good potato salad dressing
about the juice of one lemon going in
here some cider vinegar give that a stir
through and then for some peppery bite
I'm gonna add a teaspoon of Dijon
mustard in here give that all a good mix
through and really really important that
you season again with some sea salt and
black pepper potato salad dressing done
let's set that aside now we need to talk
about all the other ingredients that go
in here we've got some spring onions
we've got some celery we've got some
apples we've got some walnuts and my
secret Christmas ingredient instead of
raisins is a little bit of dried
cranberries these are really sweet
really juicy and had a wonderful bite in
this potato salad so I'm gonna dice up
my apples chopped up my celery chopped
up my spring onions and we are good to
go
as soon as you have that Apple slice top
it's really important to get it straight
into that dressing because otherwise if
you leave it out it can go Brown
so tumble it straight into that bowl and
get them coated and at this point this
is where this potato salad becomes nice
and quick everything gets tumbled in
that dressing really really quickly so
spring onions that wonderful celery in

what do we need potatoes I have my

mix it all up if you have some leftover
